驨驨驨

驨字的基本解释

驨
xí
古书上说的像马，独角、角如鹿茸的一种兽。
骐骥，良马名。

驨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《廣韻》户圭切，平齊，匣。］
兽名。像马，有一角，角如鹿茸。

驨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驨； 康熙笔画：28； 页码：页1447第12
【廣韻】戸圭切，音攜。【玉篇】騏驥也。【爾雅·釋獸】驨如馬一角，郭註角如鹿茸。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋獸】驨如馬一角，似鹿不角者騏。〕　謹按爾雅無似鹿二字。謹照原書似鹿不角者騏改郭註角如鹿茸。
驨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
驨字的起名意思

暂无。

Feast
Basic explanation of words
Feast
xí
It is said in ancient books that it is a kind of beast that resembles a horse, has a unicorn, and antlers.
Qiji, the name of a good horse.
Feast
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
["Guangyun" Hu Guiqie, flat, box. ]
Animal name. Like a horse, it has one horn, and its horns are like antlers.
Feast
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　驨; Kangxi Strokes: 28; Page Number: Page 1447 Page 12
[Guang Yun] To Kyu cut, sound carrying. [Jade articles] Qiji also. [Erya·Shiju] The horse is like the horn of a horse, and Guo's horn is like antler. Textual research: [[Erya·Shiju] The horse is like the horn of a horse, like a deer who has no horns. 〕　I would like to press the word "Erya, No Deer". According to the original book, those who resemble deer without horns will change Guo's horns like antler.

Nothing.
xī
сущ.* миф. единорог, однорогий конь
